channel.title: Utorrent and server help
channel.description:
sorry to keep bothering yu guys but i keep running into problems...
i cant portfoward with my router so i used utorrent and i checked the status page and it said i was online, ever since i havent been able to connect my source and client together..
i have it portforwarded in with utorrent in one laptop and have the source running on another, i thought that was the problem but then i downloaded the same source and client on the laptop that i run utorrent and still doesent work.
when utorrent is running, and i open the source it gives me an error like ""ip already in use" something like that but when i close utorrent then it just says "Server open at port 43594" but doesent connect to client.
WHY IS THISSS??? PLZ SOMEONE HELP ME OUT..

item.title: Utorrent and server help
item.dc:creator: @XfinitBankai XfinitBankai
item.description:
@XfinitBankai wrote:

like tv or skype?
___edit

i tried again closing utorrent then reopening with the source, and everything worked i was able to log into my server with utorrent open and everything was great i thought the problem was resolved but then i use the server status checker and it says i was offline even with utorrent open, everythings is still the same i dont know why nows its not online, usally when utorrent is open my port is open…

Read full topic

item.title: Utorrent and server help
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Ill try and help

Read full topic

item.title: Utorrent and server help
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

  1. Close Utorrent
  2. Run your server
  3. Open Utorrent Again

That should do it

Read full topic

item.title: Utorrent and server help
item.dc:creator: @XfinitBankai XfinitBankai
item.description:
@XfinitBankai wrote:

I did literally everything the tutorial says and my screen is excatly what it shows, but server status checker says its offline…, can someone plz skype or teamviewe?

Read full topic

item.title: Utorrent and server help
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

http://portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/TP-Link/default.htm
Choose your model, then follow the tutorial :).

Read full topic

item.title: Utorrent and server help
item.dc:creator: @XfinitBankai XfinitBankai
item.description:
@XfinitBankai wrote:

but even when i close utorrent it doesnt connect to the client, my router model is a tp-link

Read full topic

item.title: Utorrent and server help
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

When the server in use error comes up it’s because something is already occupying the port 43594. It very well could be uTorrent. I can possibly help you portforward your router if you give me a specific model.

Read full topic
